title: What will be the jobs in Information Technology in the next decade with a good outlook? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Information Technology

response.answer_text: Q: What will be the job in Information Technology in the next decade? Software DevelopmentDataReportingAnalyticsVisualisationBig DataWarehousingAdministration roles may decline, as client computing, telephony, communication and collaboration technology becomes commoditised, cloud based, automated and autonomic. For example, Google and Microsoft will happily rent a device, operating system, email, IM and presence, enterprise file sync and share to you for a few pounds|euros|dollars per month, and mobile companies will rent you a smartphone and mobile Internet for a few more.
All the blue circles on the left side of the graph, those are the technologies that are going to go big (if they don’t become obsolete first).
I can’t do it better than Robert Half does… Suggest you take a look at there article ‘Most In-Demand IT Jobs In 2017’ here.
